original_title: Peter O'Toole: Live from the TCM Classic Film Festival
overview: Renowned actor Peter O’Toole joined Robert Osborne at the 2011 TCM Classic Film Festival to discuss his life and career. Told in his own words, O’Toole shared revealing details during the course of the in-depth interview about the films he worked on as well as his offscreen interests.
title: Peter O'Toole: Live from the TCM Classic Film Festival
